name: Starfighter (Cody Hubbard)
description:
This simple game built with Unity made as a proof of concept and learning experience. The game demonstrates knowledge of some important Unity concepts and systems including but not limited to the following:

Object pathing · Sounds effects & music · Object instantiation · Coroutines · Particle effects · UI · Scene states and scene management

All art assets are from https://www.kenney.nl/

Music from: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
